titleStmt.title: A discourse grounded on Prov. 12.5 the thoughts of the righteous are right, proving our state (god-ward) to be as our thoughts are ... with motives and rules for keeping thoughts right : in two parts / by Faithful Teate.
titleStmt.author: Teate, Faithful, b. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
